events.message: I recently received my order but I would like to request a refund because the item doesn't meet my expectations and I no longer want to keep it.
The customer's issue was reviewed and categorized as a refund request based on their desire to return the product and get their money back.
Support agent John has been assigned to handle the refund case to provide further assistance and resolve the issue promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund faster, can you also confirm if the product was opened or used at all since delivery?
Sure, my order number is 87451239. I have not used or opened the product. It was sealed and looks brand new.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund within 3-5 business days after you ship the product back. I'll send you the return label now.
Thanks, that sounds great. I appreciate your quick help and look forward to receiving the return label to proceed.
The return label has been sent to your email. Once we receive the item, the refund will be processed immediately. Please contact us anytime if further help is needed.
We are checking in to confirm you have received the return label and your refund process is on track. Let us know if you require any assistance.
Your refund was successfully processed and this case is now closed. We thank you for your patience and hope to serve you again.
